titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at White-hall on Sunday, the 17th of February, 169 4/5 before the right honourable the lord chamberlain, ladies of the bedchambers, and others of the houshold to our late gracious Queen Mary, of blessed memory / by J. Adams ...
titleStmt.author: Adams, John, 1662-1720.

notesStmt.note: Publish'd at the request of that honourable audience."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
